ALL VESSEL DESCRIPTIONS BELOW ARE BASIS "ALL DETAILS 'ABOUT', & WOG". THEY ARE FOR GUIDANCE ONLY. ACTUAL BTB C/P HEAD OWNERS DESCRIPTION OR PB T/C STANDARD DESCRIPTION'S WILL BE PROVIDED WHEN OFFERING.
NAME: M/V NANAIMO BAY
TYPE: SINGLE DECK SEMI-BOX LOG/BULK CARRIER
CLASS: NKK
BUILT: 2016 NAMARU SHIPBUILDING CO.,LTD
FLAG: HONG KONG
SUMMER DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT/TPC: 34,407MT/9.822M/ 48.1MT
LOA/BEAM: 179.96M/30.0M
GRT/NRT: 21,538/ 11,201
GRAIN/BALE (CBM): 44,146.9/42,911.2
HO/HA: 5/5
GEARS: 4 SETS X 30MT DECK CRANE.
SPEED/CONS:  UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS UPTO AND INCLUDING BEAUFORT FORCE SCALE 4, DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3  WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND SWELL:
LADEN - ABOUT 13.9KNOTS ON ABOUT 24.4MT VLSFO
BALLAST - ABOUT 14.3KNOTS ON ABOUT 23.9MT VLSFO
WORKING 24 HOURS ABOUT 4.6 MT VLSFO + 0.1MT LSMGO
ECO SPEED (WOG):
LADEN - ABOUT 11.3KNOTS ON ABOUT 16.7MT VLSFO
BALLAST - ABOUT 12.1KNOTS ON ABOUT 16.1MT VLSFO
STRICTLY NO COMINGLING OF BUNKERS PERMITTED UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY ALLOWED BY HEAD OWNERS.
OWNERS BUNKER SPECS TO BE ALWAYS APPLY, UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY PERMITTED BY HEAD OWNERS.
VSL HAS LIBERTY TO USE LSMGO FOR MANOUVERING IN NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, STARTING ENGINES AND ON ENTERING/ LEAVING PORTS AND IN ADVERSE AND/OR COLD WEATHER OR WHEN THE GENERATOR LOAD IS LOWER THAN 50 PCT IN PORT IDLE.  VSL ALSO HAS LIBERTY TO USE LSGMO IN HER GENERATORS/AUXILIARY ENGINES WHEN REQUIRED BY LOCAL REGULATIONS.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND WITHOUT GUARANTEE.

GRT/NRT: 23,269/12,101
GRAIN/BALE (CBM): 46994.86/45238.33
HO/HA: 5/5
GEARS: 4 SETS X 30.5 MT DECK CRANE.
SPEED/CONS: UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITIONS UPTO AND INCLUDING BEAUFORT SCALE 4
DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND SWELL:
LADEN - ABOUT 14.1KNOTS ON ABOUT 26.3MT IFO
BALLAST - ABOUT 14.6KNOTS ON ABOUT 26.3MT IFO
IN PORT: IDLE ABOUT 2.3MT IFO
WORKING 24 HOURS ABOUT 6.6MT IFO
STRICTLY NO COMINGLING OF BUNKERS PERMITTED UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY ALLOWED BY HEAD
OWNERS.
OWNERS BUNKER SPECS TO BE ALWAYS APPLY, UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY PERMITTED BY HEAD
OWNERS.
VSL HAS LIBERTY TO USE MDO FOR MANOUVERING IN NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, STARTING
ENGINES AND ON ENTERING/ LEAVING PORTS AND IN ADVERSE WEATHER OR WHEN THE GENERATOR LOAD
IS LOWER THAN 50 PCT IN PORT IDLE. VSL ALSO HAS LIBERTY TO USE MDO IN HER
GENERATORS/AUXILIARY ENGINES WHEN REQUIRED BY LOCAL REGULATIONS.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND WITHOUT GUARANTEE
NAME: M/V TAI SHINE
TYPE: BULK CARRIER
CLASS: BV
BUILT: 2012
FLAG: PANAMA
SUMMER DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT/TPC: 61,473MT / 13.01M / 61.4MT
LOA/BEAM: 199.98M / 32.24M
GRT/NRT: 34,775 / 20,098
GRAIN / BALE (CBM): 77,674.69 / 73,552
HO/HA: 5/5
GEARS: 4SETS X 30MT DECK CRANE + 4SETS X 12CBM GRABS
SPEED/CONS:  IT IS AGREED THAT ALL DAYS WHERE THE WEATHER EXCEEDS BEAUFORT FORCE 4 AND/OR DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 AND/OR 2.0M ROLLING SWELL AND/OR ADVERSE CURRENT ARE EXPRESSLY EXCLUDED FROM CALCULATIONS. FAVOURABLE CURRENTS ARE NOT TO BE TAKEN INTO ACCOUNT. THE SPEED/CONSUMPTION GUARANTEE FOR BALLAST SHALL EXCLUDE HEAVY BALLAST CONDITION.
LADEN - ABOUT 13.1KNOTS AT ABOUT 29.2MT IFO 380 CST (RMG380) PLUS ABOUT 0.1MT MDO (DMB)
BALLAST - ABOUT 14.0KNOTS AT ABOUT 29.5MT IFO 380 CST (RMG380) PLUS ABOUT 0.1MT MDO (DMB)
ECO SPEED
LADEN - ABOUT 11.5KNOTS AT ABOUT 22.0MT IFO 380CST (RMG380) PLUS ABOUT 0.1MT MDO (DMB)
BALLAST - ABOUT 12.6KNOTS AT ABOUT 22.0MT IFO 380CST (RMG380) PLUS ABOUT 0.1MT MDO (DMB)
IN PORT: IDLE ABOUT 2.34MT IFO 380CST (RMG380) PLUS ABOUT 0.1MT MDO (DMB)
WORKING 24 HOURS ABOUT 5.95MT IFO 380CST (RMG380) PLUS ABOUT 0.3MT MDO (DMB)
ALLOWING BOTH 0.5 KNOTS SPEED AND 5% CONSUMPTION FOR THE TERM "ABOUT
STRICTLY NO COMINGLING OF BUNKERS PERMITTED UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY ALLOWED BY HEAD OWNERS.
OWNERS BUNKER SPECS TO ALWAYS APPLY, UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY PERMITTED BY HEAD OWNERS
IFO SPECS:  RMG380 ISO 8217:2010 MAX 0.5% SULPHUR M/M
MGO SPECS:  DMA ISO 8217:2010 MAX 0.1% SULPHUR M/M
EXTRA IFO AND/OR MDO ARE ALLOWED TO USE AT CHIEF ENGINEER’S DISCRETION UNDER THE FOLLOWING:
1. DURING RUNNING IN PERIOD AS PER INSTRUCTION MANUALS.
2. WHEN MANEUVERING IN SHALLOW OR NARROW WATER, CANAL, RIVER, IN AND OUT OF PORT, SHIFTING BETWEEN BERTHS/ANCHORAGES;
3. MAIN GENERATOR TO START/STOP, OIL CHANGE OR OVER USE;
4. FLUSHING M/E FUEL LINE WHEN VESSEL IN PORT FOR A LONG TIME;
5. EXTRA GENERATOR TO BE USED WITH MDO FOR HOLD CLEANING, OR PUMP IN/OUT OF BALLAST WATER.
VSL HAS LIBERTY TO USE MGO FOR MANEUVERING IN NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, STARTING ENGINES AND ON ENTERING/LEAVING AND IN PORTS AND IN ADVERSE WEATHER OR WHEN THE GENERATOR LOAD IS LOWER THAN 50 PCT IN PORT IDLE.  VSL ALSO HAS LIBERTY TO USE MGO IN THE GENERATORS/AUXILIARY ENGINES WHEN REQUIRED BY LOCAL REGULATIONS.
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND WITHOUT GUARANTEE.
NAME: M/V PHATRA NAREE
TYPE: BULK CARRIER, SINGLE DECK SINGLE HULL
CLASS: DNV
BUILT: AUGUST 2017 AT SAMJIN SHIPBUILDING INDUSTRIES CO., LTD. WEIHAI
FLAG: THAILAND
SUMMER DEADWEIGHT/DRAFT/TPC: 35,882.675MT / 10.216M / 49.3MT
LOA/BEAM: 180.0M / 30.0M
GRT/NRT: 22,860 / 12,082
GRAIN/BALE (CBM): 47,585.10 / 45,457.3
HO/HA: 5 / 5
STRENGTHENED FOR HEAVY CARGOES, ALTERNATE HOLD LOADING (NO. 2, 4 MAY BE EMPTY ON FULL LOAD).
GEAR: 4 CRANES OF 36 MT SWL EACH (28 MT FOR GRAB OPERATION) VLS NOT GRAB FITTED
GEAR OUTREACH: MAX ABT 11 M BEYOND SHIPS RAIL
SPEED/CONS: SPEED/CONSUMPTION DESCRIBED FROM SEABUOY TO SEABUOY. THE AFORESAID SPEED AND CONSUMPTION ARE GUARANTEED AT OPEN SEA UPTO AND INCLUDING BEAUFORT SCALE 4  (11-16 KNOTS) AND TOTAL COMBINED (SEA AND SWELL) SIGNIFICANT WAVE HEIGHT CONFINED TO LIMITS OF DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (0...5M-1.25M) WITH NO ADVERSE CURRENTS. VSL  CONSUMES LSMGO IN MAIN ENGINES WHILE MANEUVERING IN/OUT OF PORTS, CANALS, RIVERS, NARROW WATERS, FOGS ETC.
ABOVE SPEED & CONS WARRANTY IS NOT APPLICABLE  WHILE VSL STEAMING/STAYING IN ECA AREAS/PORTS ON LSMGO.
LADEN - ABOUT 13.5KNOTS ON ABOUT 21.0MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.1MT LSMGO
BALLAST - ABOUT 14.0KNOTS ON ABOUT 21.0MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.1MT LSMGO
ECO SPEED (WOG)
LADEN - ABOUT 12.0KNOTS ON ABOUT 15.5MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.1MT LSMGO
BALLAST - ABOUT 12.5KNOTS ON ABOUT 15.5MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.1MT LSMGO
CHARTERERS TO HAVE THE OPTION TO HAVE THE VESSEL RUN ON ECO SPEED AND CONSUMPTION AS DESCRIBED BY OWNERS. WHEN CHARTERERS ORDER THE VESSEL TO RUN ON ECO SPEED, THIS SHALL CONSTITUTE COMPLIANCE WITH, AND THERE SHALL BE NO BREACH OF, ANY OBLIGATION REQUIRING THE VESSEL TO PROCEED WITH UTMOST AND/OR DUE DESPATCH (OR ANY OTHER SUCH SIMILAR/EQUIVALENT EXPRESSION), AND THE CHARTERERS SHALL ENSURE THAT THE TERMS OF THE BILLS OF LADING, WAYBILLS OR OTHER DOCUMENTS EVIDENCING CONTRACTS OF CARRIAGE ISSUED BY OR ON BEHALF OF THE OWNERS PROVIDE THAT COMPLIANCE BY OWNERS WITH THIS CLAUSE DOES NOT CONSTITUTE A BREACH OF THE CONTRACT OF CARRIAGE. THE CHARTERERS SHALL INDEMNIFY THE OWNERS AGAINST ALL CONSEQUENCES AND LIABILITIES THAT MAY ARISE FROM BILLS OF LADING, WAYBILLS OR OTHER DOCUMENTS EVIDENCING CONTRACTS OF CARRIAGE BEING ISSUED AS PRESENTED TO THE EXTENT THAT THE TERMS OF SUCH BILLS OF LADING, WAYBILLS OR OTHER DOCUMENTS EVIDENCING CONTRACTS OF CARRIAGE IMPOSE OR RESULT IN BREACH OF THE OWNERS OBLIGATION TO PROCEED WITH DUE DESPATCH OR ARE TO BE HELD TO BE A DEVIATION OR THE IMPOSITION OF MORE ONEROUS LIABILITIES UPON THE OWNERS THAN THOSE ASSUMED BY THE OWNERS PURSUANT TO THIS CLAUSE.
VESSEL/OWNERS ARE NOT TO BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CLAIMS RELATED TO VESSELS SPEED AND/OR BUNKER CONSUMPTION DURING ANY PERIODS WHERE THE VESSEL HAS BEEN REQUESTED TO PROCEED AT ECO SPEED.
IT IS UNDERSTOOD THAT VESSEL NOT TO BE ORDERED TO SAIL ON ECO SPEED/CONSUMPTION IN PIRACY RISKS AREAS.
IN PORT: IDLE ABOUT 3.5MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.1MT LSMGO
WORKING 24 HOURS ABOUT 5.5MT VLSFO + ABOUT 0.1MT LSMGO
IN PORT IN WINTER (BASIS +5 DEG C) ADDITIONAL ABT 2.0 MT VLSFO PER DAY
“ABOUT” IS DEFINED AS 5% MORE ON BUNKER CONSUMPTION AND 0.5 KNOTS LESS ON VESSEL’S SPEED.
STRICTLY NO COMINGLING OF BUNKERS PERMITTED UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY ALLOWED BY HEAD OWNERS.
OWNERS BUNKER SPECS TO ALWAYS APPLY, UNLESS OTHERWISE EXPRESSLY PERMITTED BY HEAD OWNERS
BUNKER SPECS:
VLSFO (S < 0.5%): ISO 8217:2017
LSMGO (S < 0.1%): ISO-8217 F-2010(E), DMA
EMISSION CONTROL RESTRICTION BY INTERNATIONAL, NATIONAL, LOCAL AUTHORITIES TO BE MAINTAINED
VSL HAS LIBERTY TO USE LSMGO FOR MANEUVERING IN NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, STARTING ENGINES AND ON ENTERING/LEAVING AND IN PORTS AND IN ADVERSE AND/OR COLD WEATHER OR WHEN THE GENERATOR LOAD IS LOWER THAN 50 PCT IN PORT IDLE.  VSL ALSO HAS LIBERTY TO USE LSMGO IN THE GENERATORS/AUXILIARY ENGINES WHEN REQUIRED BY LOCAL REGULATIONS.
STEEL COILS: 3 TIERS OF 15 MT EACH WITH 3 DUNNAGES
AUSSIE FITTED, GRAIN FITTED, CO2 AND SMOKE DETECTION SYSTEMS FITTED
MECHANICAL VENTILATION (6 AIR CHANGES/HOUR) + NATURAL VENTILATION
VSL IS NOT A LOGGER AND NO ON DECKCARGOES PERMITTED
ALL DETAILS ABOUT AND WITHOUT GUARANTEE.
